title: AI Story Generator
description: A single-page web app that generates a story using an AI model

pages.name: Home
pages.purpose: Allow users to input parameters for the story

interactions.name: Generate Story
interactions.description: Clicking the button triggers the AI model to generate a story based on user input

acceptance_criteria: The app generates a story when the 'Generate Story' button is clicked
The story includes the user's input parameters
The story is displayed in a clear and readable format
